vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Λίνος [ῐ], ὁ,
“Linos”, a mythical minstrel, [Refs 8th c.BC+].
__II as appellative, the song or lay of Linos, whether composed by him or upon him; λίνον δ᾽ ὑπὸ καλὸν ἄειδε λεπταλέῃ φωνῇ sang the lay of Linos in accompaniment, [Refs 8th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at 2Ti.4.21
§ some accent as Λινος, Linus, (Proper name), 2Tim. 4:21*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利奴 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "網子"
保羅與提摩太認識的一位住在羅馬的信徒 (提後 4:21)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
利奴 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "网子"
保罗与提摩太认识的一位住在罗马的信徒 (提后 4:21)
